did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Publications, speeches, correspondence, and research notes.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Publications, speeches, correspondence, and related research notes of Erling D. Solberg, a land economist.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Member, International Fraternity of Lambda Alpha, George Washington Chapter.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Publications, speeches, correspondence, and related research notes of Erling D. Solberg, a land economist.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Lambda Alpha International. George Washington Chapter.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Erling D. Solberg papers, #3172. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p: Part of Lambda Alpha Literary Archives.
